#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define MAX 1000005
using namespace std;
 
int dp[MAX],n;
int prime[MAX];
void preprocess()
{
    long long j;
    int i=2;
    prime[1]=1;
    while(i<MAX)
    {
        if(prime[i]==0)
        {
            prime[i]=i;
            for(j=(long long )i+i;j<MAX;j+=i)
                prime[j]=i;
        }
        ++i;
    }
    dp[0]=0;
    for(i=2;i<=n;++i)
    {
        dp[i]=INT_MAX;
        int tmp=i;
        while(tmp!=1)
        {
            dp[i]=min(dp[i],dp[i-prime[tmp]]+1);
            
            tmp/=prime[tmp];
        }
    }
}
 
 
 
int main()
{
 
    cin>>n;
    preprocess();
    cout<<dp[n];
    return 0;
}
